## Index     

### Data    
#### Tutorials and references 
https://warwick.ac.uk/fac/sci/moac/people/students/peter_cock/r/geo/

#### Content:     
There are 4 type of GEO soft files available:    
GEO Platform (GPL): These files describe a particular type of microarray. They are annotation files.     
`Platforms (1)	GPL24676	Illumina NovaSeq 6000 (Homo sapiens)`    

GEO Sample (GSM): Files that contain all the data from the use of a single chip. For each gene there will be multiple scores including the main one, held in the VALUE column.     
```
Samples (283)             GSM5467087	SPECTRUM-OV-002_S1_CD45N_RIGHT_OVARY
                          GSM5467088	SPECTRUM-OV-002_S1_CD45P_INFRACOLIC_OMENTUM
                          GSM5467089	SPECTRUM-OV-002_S1_CD45P_RIGHT_OVARY
                          GSM5467090	SPECTRUM-OV-003_S1_UNSORTED_INFRACOLIC_OMENTUM
                          GSM5467091	SPECTRUM-OV-003_S1_UNSORTED_LEFT_ADNEXA
                          GSM5467092	SPECTRUM-OV-003_S1_UNSORTED_LEFT_UPPER_QUADRANT
                          GSM5467093	SPECTRUM-OV-003_S1_UNSORTED_PELVIC_PERITONEUM
                          ......
                          GSM5467369	SPECTRUM-OV-118_S1_CD45P_PELVIC_PERITONEUM
                          GSM5467370	SPECTRUM-OV-118_S1_CD45P_RIGHT_ADNEXA
```

GEO Series (GSE): Lists of GSM files that together form a single experiment.        
```
GSE180661_matrix.h5         30.3 Gb    ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE180nnn/GSE180661/suppl/GSE180661_matrix.h5            H5
GSE180661_GEO_cells.tsv.gz	40.7 Mb	   ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE180nnn/GSE180661/suppl/GSE180661_GEO_cells.tsv.gz	    TSV
```

GEO Dataset (GDS): These are curated files that hold a summarised combination of a GSE file and its GSM files. They contain normalised expression levels for each gene from each sample (i.e. just the VALUE field from the GSM file).
